info.name: Facebook Retro Cicles Background Generator
info.description: A background generator with various retro style circle backgrounds for my Black Facebook or my White Facebook theme. Six different color sets available.
info.additionalInfo: This is not a stand-alone style, just the background. You'll also need the Black Facebook or my White Facebook theme to get what you see in the preview images.
